h2_title: Flint Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide
content: When the Flint Vanguard is down, be sure to collect the Flint Vanguard Spirit it drops. There's also a green Wisp you can pick up, that's just to the left of the clearing.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Vanguard.md', within the main section titled 'Flint Vanguard', specifically from the subsection 'Flint Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When the Flint Vanguard is down, be sure to collect the Flint Vanguard Spirit it drops. There's also a green Wisp you can pick up, that's just to the left of the clearing.
